Body: I'd like to use po.st to shorten URLs via AutoMagic using their bookmarklet code. javascript:( function() {var s = document.createElement('script'); s.setAttribute('id', 'postbookmarklet_js'); s.setAttribute('src', ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://s.po.st' : 'http://i.po.st') + '/static/v3/bookmarklet/post-bookmarklet.js?apiKey=E205272E-A768-42E7-A6B1-9D99559C54EB'); document.body.appendChild(s);}() );I don't have the foggiest as to what I need to do to make that happen would someone help me please?
Title: AutoMagic as a URL shortener

history.Text: I'd like to use [po.st][2] to shorten URLs via [**AutoMagic**][1] using their bookmarklet code.     javascript:( function() {var s = document.createElement('script'); s.setAttribute('id', 'postbookmarklet_js'); s.setAttribute('src', ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://s.po.st' : 'http://i.po.st') + '/static/v3/bookmarklet/post-bookmarklet.js?apiKey=E205272E-A768-42E7-A6B1-9D99559C54EB'); document.body.appendChild(s);}() ); I don't have the foggiest as to what I need to do to make that happen would someone help me please?![enter image description here][3]  [1]: http://automagic4android.com "AutoMagic"  [2]: http://po.st "PO.ST"  [3]: https://automagic4android.com/images/AutomagicFeatureGraphic_730.jpg

I'd like to use [po.st][2] to shorten URLs via [**AutoMagic**][1] using their bookmarklet code.     javascript:( function() {var s = document.createElement('script'); s.setAttribute('id', 'postbookmarklet_js'); s.setAttribute('src', ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://s.po.st' : 'http://i.po.st') + '/static/v3/bookmarklet/post-bookmarklet.js?apiKey=E205272E-A768-42E7-A6B1-9D99559C54EB'); document.body.appendChild(s);}() ); I don't have the foggiest as to what I need to do to make that happen would someone help me please?
